text:
e="preserve">Sravani Kondapalli was a Telugu television actress. In her eight-year-long career, she appeared in TV shows such as "Manasu Mamata" and "Mounaragam".
Death.
On 08 September 2020, Sravani was found dead at her home in Hyderabad. Her death was reported to have been a suicide by hanging. She was 26.
